name: Dealer Mate
overview:
Dealer-Mate is a complete dealer management software comprised of all the necessary functions to enable auto dealerships to finance their buyers, negotiate and close deals, print forms, manage inventory, leads, finance & inventory (F&I), Buy Here Pay Here (BHPH), Accounting, Parts & Service, Web marketing, VIN decoding and much more!

Our software is designed to work for all types of Used Car Dealerships, Automobile Retail Dealers, Leasing Brokers, Wholesalers, Finance Companies, Boat, Motorcycle, RV, Bus, Scooters, Heavy Trucks, Trailers, and many other specialties. Dealer-Mate is a user-friendly, powerful, and robust single-entry dealer management system with versions for Windows (PC) and Mac (Apple), Smartphones, iPad, Tablets. Dealer-Mate offers stand-alone, client server and cloud based dealer management platforms.

There is a free 45 trial version of the auto dealer software as well. This trial version is a carbon copy of what you would actually buy and use. It takes our qualified technicians only few minutes to connect to your computer(s) to activate our ready to use Dealer-Mate. If you find that our software application meets your needs and requirements, we will provide the fully functional DMS software solution. Once implemented it will exceed your highest expectations. Try Dealer-Mate free for 45 days, and see for your self. This is the best Auto dealer software on the market.
